member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Parses the size of the readable file.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Global.Utilities.FileUtilityMethods.ParseReadableFileSize(System.Int32)
member.summary: Parses the size of the readable file.

member.name: M:Krypton.Toolkit.Suite.Extended.Global.Utilities.FileUtilityMethods.GetBytesReadable(System.Int64)
member.summary: This is a highly optimized function to get the file size abbreviation in bytes for an arbitrary, 64-bit file size. It returns the file size to three decimals followed by the abbreviation, like KB, MB, GB, etc. Use this function to display a human-readable, user-friendly file size to your users. https://www.somacon.com/p576.php
member.returns: Returns the human-readable file size for an arbitrary, 64-bit file size.

member.summary: Returns the size of the online file.

member.summary: Formats the length of the file.

member.summary: Retrieves the file length from the specified file.
member.param: The file path to the specified file.
member.returns: The file length from the specified file.
